content: this pattern is not for sale/resale you may sell only the finished product but you must credit the gussied up goose for the design this pattern was designed for a standard sized porch goose 23 inches tall this pattern includes the hat with the ears wings not included this pattern has not been tested yet please send any issues directly to me what you will need yarn medium weight yarn in orange and white hooks 4mm g-6 scissors for cutting the yarn needle for sewing and weaving in ends stitches you should know sts stitches slip knot chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet increase single_crochet twice into one stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet magic_ring or any alternative to create a circle
